title: Divinity Original Sin (1.0.74 To 1.0.81+ Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the 1.0.81 Patch for "Divinity Original Sin". The 1.0.74 Patch needs to be installed in order to successfully install the patch. Also this comes with the latest version of the level editor. This patch only works for the gog version of the game. If you want the gog version of "Divinity Original Sin". You can download it at the link below. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.

Divinity Original Sin (1.0.74 To 1.0.81+ Patch Notes)


1.0.81

-Fix for error 117 (during saving with unicode profile/user names)
-Fix for floating camera

Divinity Engine Toolkit changes

-Added "templates folder" with source data for main campaign (Divinity engine toolkit)
-Stability fix in resource manager

1.0.78

- Several rare crash fixes
- Fix for newly introduced save/load issues (Mac)
- Fix for crashing on saving (Windows)
